full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## W684H-210057B - Janitorial Services - CFB Stadacona, Halifax, NS
### Solicitation Number: S11-WS4329117405
### Issue Date: 2024-02-22
### Closing Date: 2024-03-14T14:00:00
The Department of National Defence, CFB Stadacona, Halifax, NS invites interested contractors to bid on the Janitorial Services contract. The contract covers the provision of comprehensive janitorial services for multiple buildings located at CFB Stadacona. The services will include but not be limited to, floor care, window cleaning, dusting and disinfecting.

## Period of the Contract
The contract will be awarded for a two-year period with an option to extend the contract by three additional one-year periods.

## Security Requirement
This contract will require a security clearance.

## Government of Canada Contracting Policy
Offers are solicited under the Government of Canada Contracting Policy and subject to the information set out in this Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Bidder Requirements
To be eligible to bid, bidders must:

* Possess the necessary qualifications and experience
* Be registered and in good standing with the Government of Canada's vendor register
* Possess all necessary licenses and certifications

## Geographical Location
The janitorial services will be provided at CFB Stadacona, Halifax, NS.

## Contact Information
For questions regarding this tender, please contact:

 Kristelle LeBlanc
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Phone: [Not provided]
Email: kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
The tender notice is available online at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18880024?extsite=MTg4ODAwMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18880024?extsite=MTg4ODAwMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note that every line item in the original text has been preserved but with some text rephrased for clarity and professionalism. There are some text duplications preserved as the translator model might not be able to decide what is more readable if both Canadian
